name: Honey Comb Home
description:
Mr. Beezwax Needs Your Help!
It was beeznus as usual, Mr. Beezwax was tending to the Royal Honey Comb, but a crazy windstorm has jumbled everything into a mess. The queen bee is returning and will only be pleased if things are put back in order. Help Mr. Beezwax complete all 240 jumbled honey combs and clean up before Honey Comb Home. Enjoy 4 different difficulties spread across 240 fun filled levels. Each level has a selection of pieces which can be dropped into the proper locations to complete the puzzle. If you get stuck you can use the honey hints provided to help you along. Honey hints are rewarded over play time and for completing certain levels. Help out Mr. Beezwax and have fun along the way.

FEATURES
240 Levels
4 Difficulties
Easy to learn
Challenging Puzzles
Hints to help
No Paywalled Content
No In App Purchases
